attributes.action: Abandon Plans To Introduce New Police Stop & Quiz Power
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
As you will be aware the Home Office is considering new Stop & Quiz powers for the whole of the UK. This is clearly a breach of our civil liberties. We have to right to go about our everyday life without having the fear of being stopped by the police and HAVING to answer questions about what we our doing when we are NOT suspected of committing a crime.

Contact you local MP and as many Lords as possible so that this proposed bill is STOPPED NOW!!!

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
